contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 25, 1970 D Skelmersdale Contest (Section A)
Skelmersdale Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Skelmersdale Contest skelmersdale-contest-section-a
Brookfield School, Skelmersdale, Lancashire, England, UK Best cornet and euphonium - British Vita. Best horn - Leigh Silver. Best trombone - Tyldesley. Prizes - 1st £30 and cup, 2nd £15 and cup, 3rd £10 and cup. 11 bands competed. 3rd annual contest.
March 25, 2013, 10:25 p.m. June 18, 2016, 9:50 a.m.
1 British Vita Works Band F. Clayton Scheherazade
2 Tyldesley Band Brian Peacock Henry V [Maldwyn Price]
3 Hade Edge Jack Fisher Themes from Symphony No. 5 [Beethoven]
4 Marsden Silver Prize Band Bryan Garside Themes from Symphony No. 5 [Beethoven]
Unknown Result Christ Church (Bradford) Silver Ernie Wedgewood Fancy Free
Unknown Result Leigh Silver Band Alan Hobson Promenade
Unknown Result Salford Silver J. H. Cooke Homeward
Unknown Result Stacksteads Brass Band Stanley Whiteman Othello
Unknown Result Stretford Band E. R. Harris Resurgam
Unknown Result Boarshurst Silver Band A. N. Kilroy Scheherazade
Unknown Result Walkden Band E. Vint Norwegian Carnival
Withdrawn City of Sheffield Youth Band Derek Ashmore
